name: MaterialReport
responsibilities: Store data that always goes in a material report (the material itself and pickup location)

name: SentMaterialReport
responsibilities: Store data about a company's material sending, as well as the entrepeneur who received it

name: ReceivedMaterialReport
responsibilities: Store data about an entrepeneur's material reception, as well as the company who sent it

name: EntrepeneurReport
responsibilities: Store a list of materials received by an entrepeneur

name: CompanyReport
responsibilities: Store the list of materials sent by a company

name: Admin
responsibilities: Store

name: Company
responsibilities: Store data about a company (name, location...)
Create a report of all materials the company sent over a period of time
Accept or reject an invitation

name: Entrepeneur
responsibilities: Store data about an entrepeneur (name, location, title, habilitations, and specializations)
Create a report of all materials the entrepeneur received over a period of time

name: Habilitation
responsibilities: Store information about an habilitation (type and level)
Check if the habilitation satisfies a concrete requirement

name: Requirement
responsibilities: Store information about a requirement (type and level)
Check if a concrete set of habilitations satisfy a concrete set of requirements

name: Material
responsibilities: Store data about the material (name, appropiate measures, and requirements)

name: MaterialAmount
responsibilities: Store data about a certain amount of a certain material
Create objects of itself, checking the given unit is valid for the given material

name: Measure
responsibilities: Represent a concrete type of measure (weight, length...) through which a certain quantity of material can be determined

name: Unit
responsibilities: Represent a concrete unit of a measure
Convert from one unit to another of the same measure

name: Currency
responsibilities: Represent a concrete currency
Convert from one currency into another

name: Location
responsibilities: Guarda la ubicaci√≥n de un material y calcula la distancia entre el material y el receptor del mismo

name: Price
responsibilities: Store the price of a material, in a concrete currency ($, U$S) per a concrete quantity unit (kg, g, L, mL)

name: User
responsibilities: Store information about a program user (type and name)

name: Invitation
responsibilities: Store information about an invitation (the admin who sent the invitation, the company who receives it, the offer it's suggested to make)
Store its current state (pending, accepted, or rejected)
Change its state when the company validates or rejects the invitation

name: Offer
responsibilities: Stores information about an offer of materials (the material and amount, the price, and the location of the materials)

name: Client
responsibilities: Communicate with the user via the I/O system

name: Memory
responsibilities: Communicate with the permanent memory of the program (which can be, among other things, a file or a database)
